resources.string:
Vikas Lohar is a result-driven Android Developer with a passion for leveraging innovative strategies to drive brand growth and customer engagement in the ever-evolving digital landscape.

Feel free to reach me out for any specific queries.

We are seeking a skilled Web Developer to design, code, and modify websites according to client specifications. Responsibilities include developing user-facing features, collaborating with team members on UI/UX designs, writing clean and maintainable code, optimizing applications for speed and scalability, testing for reliability, and staying updated on emerging technologies. The ideal candidate will have proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and server-side languages, along with strong problem-solving and communication skills. A Bachelor\'s degree in Computer Science or related field and proven work experience as a web developer are required.

• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science.
 • Proven work experience as a web developer.
 • Strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
 • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. 
 • Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
 • Creativity and ability to propose innovative solutions.
 • Knowledge of database technology 
 • Proficiency in version control systems such as Git.
